column5: A business degree for high-achieving non-business graduatesThe 12-month full-time Master of Management (MMgt) is designed to equip graduates from non-business programs with the tools they need for managing and problem solving in a variety of organizations and environments.The MMgt pairs general management education with a special non-technical focus on developing leadership, problem-solving and communication skills.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
